lead_paragraph: The office of Eric Schneiderman, New York's attorney general, has issued a “notice of violation” to the Donald J. Trump Foundation, ordering it to immediately stop soliciting donations in New York. It said that the office's charities bureau had determined that the charity had been fund-raising in New York this year when it was not registered to do so under state law.

headline.main: Letter to Trump Foundation From New York Attorney General’s Office
